item.title: ToggleExp For 508 / 525
item.dc:creator: @JohnnyWorldz517 JohnnyWorldz517
item.description:
@JohnnyWorldz517 wrote:

My first tutorial , well cant really tell this is a tutorial well here,

Req; Copy and paste , Commands.java , compiler

Copy;

} if (cmd[0].equals("toggle")) { p.getExperience ^= true; p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You will now receive "+(p.getExperience ? "" : "no ")+"experience while in combat.");

Paste somewhere in commands.java

Then just compile

p.getExperience ^= true; GainExp while in combat
p.getExperience ^= false; Lock exp while in combat,

How to activate it; while ingame type ::toggle first time lock exp , second time unlock exp.

Read full topic
